getSiteTypes

public EnumSet<SiteType> getSiteTypes()
The site types used for this query.

Returns:
the site types associated with this query.

isIncludeEmptySites

public boolean isIncludeEmptySites()
The flag indicates if the query should include/exclude sites that are empty. Empty sites generally have no navigation associated with them (hence cannot be viewed) which typically happens for spaces of a parent group. For example the space /platform is the parent group of /platform/administrators, however the /platform space should never be returned as a site in most cases.

Returns:
true if the query should return sites that are empty, false otherwise (default)

nextPage

public SiteQuery nextPage()
Convenience method for creating a new SiteQuery with pagination set to the next page represented by by Pagination.getNext()

Returns:
a new SiteQuery with pagination set to the next page.

previousPage

public SiteQuery previousPage()
Convenience method for creating a new SiteQuery with pagination set to the previous page represented by by Pagination.getPrevious()

Returns:
a new SiteQuery with pagination set to the previous page.
